channel.title: Ipban?
channel.description: ok, now my ipban used to work on my server, and i got rid of some portals here and there, nothing big. but for some reason, ipban doesnt work anymore. i will add it to banndedclips, or use my command. and it will ban them, and ill watch the command prompt and it will say for there new acc that they cant log in because there ip is banned, and it will say they dissconnect, but then it lets them log on there new account anyways! but if they log out, that account will become banned, but they could just do the samething with the new account. could someone please tell me how to fix it, and make it so no one from the ip can log in. thank you

item.title: Ipban?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

just open ur banned ips’s folder and clear it…make sure it got no spaces or enters
press enter then save
it worked for me!!

Read full topic

try making a new bannedips in ur data folder than go into there char file and get there ip

item.title: Ipban?
item.dc:creator: @X_EPR_X X_EPR_X
item.description:
@X_EPR_X wrote:

ok, now my ipban used to work on my server, and i got rid of some portals here and there, nothing big. but for some reason, ipban doesnt work anymore. i will add it to banndedclips, or use my command. and it will ban them, and ill watch the command prompt and it will say for there new acc that they cant log in because there ip is banned, and it will say they dissconnect, but then it lets them log on there new account anyways! but if they log out, that account will become banned, but they could just do the samething with the new account. could someone please tell me how to fix it, and make it so no one from the ip can log in. thank you

Read full topic
